data_k - Semantic Correlation Data

data_k.Rd

This data set contains simulated data on the correlation between the semantics of masculine and feminine role nouns in German. A possible question to investigate with this data set is whether the correlation strength depends on the frequency of either role nouns.

data_k

Format

A data frame with 600 rows and 4 variables:

correlation

correlation coefficient of a pertinent role noun pair

freq_masc_log

log-transformed frequency of masculine role nouns

freq_fem_log

log-transformed frequency of feminine role nouns

wordlength

word length of the item

Source

Schmitz, D., & Esser, J. (2022). SfL: Statistics for Linguistics. R package version 0.3. URL: https://github.com/dosc91/SfL
